reviews.content:
I just needed a good adblocker and the background ability for when I have to reply a message. This carries those feature for sure and it is lightweight. Must have! 

@pancakeufo
Working for the most part iPhone 7 12.1.1.1 b3. Minor bugs while hiding lower tap items.

No compatible with A12 , YET 
(Reviewed by @iTollMouS)
